# UICollectionView.ScrollPosition

**Structure**

Constants that indicate how to scroll an item into the visible portion of the collection view.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ScrollPosition
```

## Constants

- **top**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the top of the collection view’s bounds.
- **centeredVertically**: Scroll so that the item is centered vertically in the collection view.
- **bottom**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the bottom of the collection view’s bounds.
- **left**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the left edge of the collection view’s bounds.
- **centeredHorizontally**: Scroll so that the item is centered horizontally in the collection view.
- **right**: Scroll so that the item is positioned at the right edge of the collection view’s bounds.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a scroll-position structure with the specified raw value.

## Scrolling an item into view

- **scrollToItem(at:at:animated:)**: Scrolls the collection view contents until the specified item is visible.
- **UICollectionView.ScrollDirection**: Constants that indicate the direction of scrolling for the layout.
